title: Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse; PS/2 and USB; 300 DPI; colors: red, gray, white
descriptions:
Introducing the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse, the perfect blend of style, functionality, and precision. With its sleek design and advanced features, this trackball mouse is a must-have for both work and play.

Featuring a versatile connectivity option with both PS/2 and USB ports, you can easily connect this mouse to any device. The high 300 DPI (dots per inch) ensures smooth and accurate tracking, giving you complete control over your cursor movement.

Choose from three stunning colors - red, gray, or white - to match your personal style and add a pop of color to your workspace. The dimensions of 7 inches length, 2.5 inches height, and 4 inches width make it compact and portable, perfect for on-the-go usage.

The Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is packed with incredible features. The trackball design provides precise control and eliminates the need for a traditional mouse pad. The side-to-side scrolling feature allows for effortless navigation through documents and web pages.

With two buttons, you have all the necessary functions at your fingertips. Whether you are left-handed or right-handed, this mouse is suitable for everyone, offering maximum comfort and convenience.

Rest assured, this high-quality product is proudly made in China, ensuring top-notch craftsmanship and durability.

Upgrade your computing experience with the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse. Enjoy seamless navigation, precision control, and stylish design all in one package. Get yours today and take your productivity to new heights.

No more tangled wires or compatibility issues - this mouse has got you covered. With a high DPI of 300, you can expect precise and accurate tracking for all your tasks, whether it's graphic design, gaming, or simply browsing the web.

The two buttons provide easy access to essential functions, ensuring a seamless user experience.

Designed for both left-handed and right-handed users, this mouse caters to everyone's needs. No more struggling with awkward hand positions - the Logitech Trackman Marble 2017 Trackball Mouse is here to provide ergonomic comfort throughout your workday.

Rest assured that this high-quality mouse is made with care in China. Logitech, a trusted brand in the industry, ensures that you receive a reliable and durable product that will stand the test of time.
